people.name: Eva
people.bio: Eva is a graphic designer with a passion for minimalistic and modern design. She has worked with various startups, helping them establish a strong visual identity.

people.name: Mark
people.bio: Mark is a software engineer with over 10 years of experience in the tech industry. He specializes in backend development and enjoys working on open-source projects.

people.name: Krysia
people.bio: Krysia is a passionate educator who loves teaching young children. She has a background in early childhood education and is dedicated to creating a nurturing learning environment.

people.name: John
people.bio: John is an avid traveler and freelance writer. He has visited over 50 countries and shares his experiences through his popular travel blog.

people.name: Edmund
people.bio: Edmund is a historian with a deep interest in medieval history. He has published several articles in academic journals and enjoys giving lectures on his favorite topics.

people.name: Roman
people.bio: Roman is a fitness coach who specializes in strength training and nutrition. He works with clients of all levels, helping them achieve their health and fitness goals.
